description_expanded: Homesick Premium Scented Candle - Hawaii is designed to deliver everyday reliability with thoughtful details suited for home fragrance. A premium scented candle designed to evoke the nostalgic scent of Hawaii, with notes of tropical flowers, coconut, and ocean breeze. Built for convenience and value, it balances quality materials with practical features you can rely on at home, on the go, or as a thoughtful gift.
